gw.api.web

Class ScopedVar<T extends Object>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.web.ScopedVar<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RequestVar, SessionVar

    public class ScopedVar<T extends Object>
extends Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean RequestAvailable
      Returns True if it is safe to call get() and set(). Otherwise, those methods will throw an exception. Tests if there is an HTTP request in context. The absence of a request indicates there is nowhere to store the value of this variable. Sometimes it's useful to test for the request if it's possible to execute the enclosing code block in an environment that may not run within a request or session. For instance, some batch server environments execute independent of a request.

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Object

        Class

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object get()
      Gets the type-safe value stored in the scope for this variable.
      void set(Object value)
      Stores a type-safe value in the scope for this variable.

        equals, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • RequestAvailable

        boolean RequestAvailable
        Returns True if it is safe to call get() and set(). Otherwise, those methods will throw an exception.

        Tests if there is an HTTP request in context. The absence of a request indicates there is nowhere to store the value of this variable. Sometimes it's useful to test for the request if it's possible to execute the enclosing code block in an environment that may not run within a request or session. For instance, some batch server environments execute independent of a request.

      • get

        Object get()
        Gets the type-safe value stored in the scope for this variable.
        Returns:
        The value stored in the scope for this variable.

      • set

        void set(Object value)
        Stores a type-safe value in the scope for this variable.
        Parameters:
        value - A value to store in the scope for this variable.
